wikipedia_page.main:
Mark Leslie Quayle (born 2 October 1978) is an English former footballer.
He played for Everton, Notts County, Grantham Town, Morecambe, Telford United, Nuneaton Borough, Chester City, Scarborough, Northwich Victoria, Hyde United and Colwyn Bay. Quayle scored a lot of goals in the non-league game including a crucial winning goal against Southend in a 3rd Round FA Cup Replay tie which secured Scarborough a lucrative home tie against Chelsea.

*Mark Quayle (advocate, b. 1841) QC, (1841–1928), Manx-born advocate and businessman
